comment: Lots of options, easy on the battery.. good job
title: Great

author: 王继光
comment: It looks beautiful.
title: Awesome!

author: Eddie Espinoza
comment: Although I can't save any presets yet. Dev responded promptly saying he/she will try to release an update soon with that feature.
title: Fantastic

author: Nathan Keck
comment: So easy to customize!  The true agent can't be without his/her proper representation on their Android Wear.
title: Highly recommended!

author: James Ford
comment: Great faces and customisation, great support from developer and excited to see additions post anomalies...
title: Brilliant

author: ack lawless
comment: Custom settings are awesome! Themes can be changed and can input own info!
title: Best watch face ever!

author: Juan Aguayo
comment: Easy to customize, and seamless experience.
title: Great watch face!

author: Jonathan FRENTZ
comment: Very nice watchface, just need to fix the phone battery that is not correct all the time, often blocked to 62% and need to restart the app to sync again. Maybe a global sync issue, not sure.

reply.author: hardartcore
reply.content:
Hi Jonathan,
Thanks for your support! Can you contact me on email so I can assist you and find the reason it is not working properly on your devices.
Thanks in advance!

title: Almost perfect

author: Dave Dean
comment: Back to being great again - developer fixed a crashing issue literally within an hour or so of me submitting a crash report. More devs should be like this.  By far my favourite watch face.
title: Love it

author: Patrick Danforth
comment: This face has a ton of options and looks great! I went from a Nexus 5 to a Nexus 6 and now it won't show up. I would love to get it working again. Tech support was fast and I am up and running again! This is seriously so worth the money!

author: Dominic Barrios
comment: Perfect watchface for Ingress players/fanatics
title: If you're an Ingress Fan,  get this..

author: Antonio Marchina
comment: This is one of the best faces ever. Could you add the ability to colorize the inventory icon

reply.author: hardartcore
reply.content:
Hi Antonio,
Thanks for your support! I will try to include this feature in the next update!

author: LORD SS
comment: Can you add the interactive function？

reply.author: hardartcore
reply.content: This is going to be included in the next updates, so stay tuned!

title: Great Watchface

author: Carter Foulger
comment: Works amazingly. Love the customizations.

reply.author: hardartcore
reply.content:
Hi Carter,
Thanks for your support!

title: Yup. Yup yup yup.

author: Tg Virus
comment: Great features
title: Love it!

author: Laila Berrios
comment: This is easily the most beautiful & customizable Ingress watch. I had fun making it my own. Problems: I had a lot of trouble getting it initially installed on my Moto 360. It wasn't showing up. After resetting everything and giving up, it was suddenly there. CURRENT PROBLEMS: 1) The phone battery % is rarely accurate even after I resync apps and restart both devices. Today it kept showing 16% after it was charged last night. 2) The "next event" is rarely the "next" event. It's usually the 2nd or 3rd.

reply.author: hardartcore
reply.content:
Hi Laila!
Thanks for your support and feedback! I will investigate these issues and fix them!

title: Beautiful but some problems

author: Aakroma Gunz
comment: Would be 5 ⭐ but the phone battery icon doesn't work with my phone. Phone is a Sony Xperia Z3 if that helps 😀

reply.author: hardartcore
reply.content:
Hi Aakroma!
Thanks for your support! I am investigating this issue and will push an update as soon as I find the reason and fix this issue!
Thanks for your patience.

title: Awesome watchface!

author: Sen ectus
comment: Very attractive, EXTREMELY configurable and customization able. Battery widgets appear to be a bit buggy, but am lovin it!

author: Alex-Zander Garner
comment: Awesome watch face

author: Dave Yates
comment: Fantastic!

author: Zachary Luke McNeely
comment: Easily the most customizable watch face for Ingress agents. Although nearly perfect for my needs, I would love to see the inventory icon include all anomalies, not only the most recent.

reply.author: hardartcore
reply.content: Hi Zachary, thanks for the support! We are working on integrating themes and icons for all anomalies and soon it will be ready, so stay tuned!

author: Kenneth Colwell
comment: Great ingress face, good battery life. Only request would be for main icons to be bigger.
title: Love the fave

author: Simon Green
comment: Resistance key should be diamond design
title: Great face.

author: Andrew Dresden
comment: Does not show up on phone, Moto Connect app, or Android Wear app. As well as not on the watch at all. Did what description suggested for troubleshooting did not fix, not address issue of not actually being on phone. Nexus 6 5.1 Lollipop

reply.author: hardartcore
reply.content: Hi Andrew, try to resync app from Android Wear companion app , disconnect and connect your watch to your smartphone, try to clear data and cache of your Android Wear app.If this steps doesn't work for you just contact us using email so we can help you resolving your issue. Thanks for the support!

title: Installed but nonexistent

author: Roman Keckes
comment: After the update, it is nice to have option to chose enl or res logo. But, the ingress logo is still not correct. There are three different versions of the hexagram logos. One neutral ingress, one for enlightened and one for resistance each with minnor differences . You are using the resistance hexagram logo variant instead of the ingress version.

reply.author: hardartcore
reply.content: Hi Roman, the main logo should be changing it's color changing themes to enlightened / resistance and etc. With the next update we will add an option to use Enlightened or Resistance logo in your themes which will be very soon! Thank you!

title: "wrong" main ingress logo

author: Laurent S.
comment: Works perfect on my LG G Watch R. Like the customizability of this watchface.
title: Like it

author: Justin
comment: I had a problem and emailed the developer.  He worked with me and got me to solve my problem.  Great watch face

reply.author: hardartcore
reply.content: Hi Justin, sometimes it may take longer for apps to sync with your watch, that is something which don't depend on us. Try to resync applications with your watch, if this not work try to reinstall application. You can write on our email if this doesn't work for you so we can assist to discover your problem.

title: Watch not showing up

author: Andrew Smith
comment: I only had one issue and that is being remedied. This is very customizable and fun to have. Well worth the price for admission.
title: Nice job.

author: Christopher Dalton
comment: Still not working, have uninstalled, re installed, synced apps, and it still fails to update watch face. I  running the latest android wear and have a lg g watch.

reply.author: hardartcore
reply.content:
Hi Christopher, be sure that both watch and phone are connected, if that's not the issue remove it from your watch and install it again.If that didn't work too, can you email us with your android wear version and the device which you are using at damcrew032@gmail.com.
Thanks in advance!

title: Gapps stops working

author: Свето Диод
comment: My Favorite WatcFace
title: The best watcface ever!

author: h1ghstrung
comment: This watch face makes me want to buy more tech. Is there a way we can use this watch face as a widget on a Samsung Galaxy S5 phone?

author: Scott Wieduwilt
comment: I really wanted this face but unfortunately it does not work with Samsung Gear S2

reply.author: hardartcore
reply.content:
Hi Scott!
Thanks for the support, but as mentioned in the description this watchface works only in watches that runs Android Wear 5.0+. Samsung Gear S2 runs Tizen OS, which is still not supported.

title: Does not work with Gear S2

author: Super Wayne
comment: Never sync to my moto 360 after change style

reply.author: hardartcore
reply.content: Hi, can you send us an email to damcrew032@gmail.com with more specific details about your problem on your watch so we can fix it! It is tested on Moto 360 and everything should work fine! Thanks in advance!
